verses.text: And it came to pass in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add that\add* this \w word|strong="H1697"\w* came unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thee a \w roll|strong="H4039"\w* of a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, and \w write|strong="H3789"\w* therein all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and against all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, from the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee, from the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*, even unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

It may be that the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* will \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* which I \w purpose|strong="H2803"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them; that they may \w return|strong="H7725"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; that I may \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* and their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

Then \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w*: and \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* from the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, upon a \w roll|strong="H4039"\w* of a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*.

And \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w*; I \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

Therefore \w go|strong="H0935"\w* thou, and \w read|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*, which thou hast \w written|strong="H3789"\w* from my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* upon the \w fasting|strong="H6685"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and also thou shalt \w read|strong="H7121"\w* them in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* that come \w out|strong="H0935"\w* of their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.

It may be they will \w present|strong="H5307"\w* their \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and will \w return|strong="H7725"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: for \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \add is\add* the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and the \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* against this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.  +  r 36.7  t they…: Heb. their supplication shall fail *

And \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him, \w reading|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

And it came to pass in the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, in the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* they \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* a \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Then \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, in the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* of \w Gemariah|strong="H1587"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, in the \w higher|strong="H5945"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, at the \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.  +  r 36.10  t entry: or, door *

¶ When \w Michaiah|strong="H4321"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gemariah|strong="H1587"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* out of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*,

Then he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, into the \w scribe’s|strong="H5608"\w* \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w*: and, lo, all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* there, \add even\add* \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and \w Delaiah|strong="H1806"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, and \w Elnathan|strong="H0494"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Achbor|strong="H5907"\w*, and \w Gemariah|strong="H1587"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, and \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, and all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*.

Then \w Michaiah|strong="H4321"\w* \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* unto them all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that he had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, when \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Therefore all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jehudi|strong="H3065"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Cushi|strong="H3570"\w*, unto \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the \w roll|strong="H4039"\w* wherein thou hast \w read|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w come|strong="H3212"\w*. So \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w roll|strong="H4039"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto them.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Sit \w down|strong="H3427"\w* now, and \w read|strong="H7121"\w* it in our \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*. So \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \add it\add* in their \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.

Now it came to pass, when they had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, they were \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w* \w both|strong="H0413"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* and \w other|strong="H7453"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w*, We will \w surely|strong="H5046"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

And they \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* us now, How didst thou \w write|strong="H3789"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* at his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*?

Then \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* them, He \w pronounced|strong="H7121"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* unto me with his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and I \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \add them\add* with \w ink|strong="H1773"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* unto \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* thee, thou and \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*; and let no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w where|strong="H0375"\w* ye be.

¶ And they went \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* into the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, but they laid \w up|strong="H6485"\w* the \w roll|strong="H4039"\w* in the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* of \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

So the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Jehudi|strong="H3065"\w* to \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* the \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*: and he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* it out of \w Elishama|strong="H0476"\w* the \w scribe’s|strong="H5608"\w* \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w*. And \w Jehudi|strong="H3065"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* it in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* which \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

Now the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w winterhouse|strong="H1004"\w* in the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*: and \add there was a fire\add* on the \w hearth|strong="H0254"\w* \w burning|strong="H1197"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.

And it came to pass, \add that\add* when \w Jehudi|strong="H3065"\w* had \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* or \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w leaves|strong="H1817"\w*, he \w cut|strong="H7167"\w* it with the \w penknife|strong="H8593"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \add it\add* into the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* that \add was\add* on the \w hearth|strong="H0254"\w*, until all the \w roll|strong="H4039"\w* was \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* that \add was\add* on the \w hearth|strong="H0254"\w*.

Yet they were not \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w*, nor \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* their \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, \add neither\add* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, nor any of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* that \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

Nevertheless \w Elnathan|strong="H0494"\w* and \w Delaiah|strong="H1806"\w* and \w Gemariah|strong="H1587"\w* had made \w intercession|strong="H6293"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* that he would not \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* the \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*: but he would not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* them.

But the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Jerahmeel|strong="H3396"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hammelech|strong="H4429"\w*, and \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azriel|strong="H5837"\w*, and \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abdeel|strong="H5655"\w*, to \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* and \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* them.\f + \fr 36.26 \ft of Hammelech: or, of the king\f*

¶ Then the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* the \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*, and the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* at the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thee \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*, and \w write|strong="H3789"\w* in it all the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that were in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*, which \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* hath \w burned|strong="H8313"\w*.

And thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Thou hast \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* this \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Why hast thou \w written|strong="H3789"\w* therein, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* shall \w certainly|strong="H0935"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and shall cause to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* from thence \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*?

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*; He shall have none to \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: and his dead \w body|strong="H5038"\w* shall be cast \w out|strong="H7993"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to the \w heat|strong="H2721"\w*, and in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* to the \w frost|strong="H7140"\w*.

And I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* him and his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* and his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* for their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*; and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon them, and upon the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and upon the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, all the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that I have \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* against them; but they \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not.\f + \fr 36.31 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*

¶ Then \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w roll|strong="H4039"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* it to \w Baruch|strong="H1263"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Neriah|strong="H5374"\w*; who \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* therein from the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* which \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* had \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: and there were \w added|strong="H3254"\w* besides unto them \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w like|strong="H1992"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 36.32 \ft like: Heb. as they\f*
